channel.title: How can i Make items stackable!?
channel.description: on a 317 how do i make onyx and diamond bolts stackable as they arnt.

item.title: How can i Make items stackable!?
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:3, topic:339616”]Try this:

Go into Item.java, and you should see something like this:

itemStackable[6685] = false; itemStackable[6687] = false;

There may be more of them. Simply change the item id and return it true.[/quote]
OH YEAH!
I know I saw that someware, thanks for reminding me:)

Read full topic
item.source: How can i Make items stackable!?

item.title: How can i Make items stackable!?
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“Rixxx, post:4, topic:339616”][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=436000.msg3202720#msg3202720 date=1273465967]
Try this:

Go into Item.java, and you should see something like this:

itemStackable[6685] = false; itemStackable[6687] = false;

There may be more of them. Simply change the item id and return it true.
[/quote]
then what is the use of the ‘stackable’ DATA file?[/quote]

It’s a data file, nothing to do with your items

Read full topic
item.source: How can i Make items stackable!?

item.title: How can i Make items stackable!?
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:3, topic:339616”]Try this:

Go into Item.java, and you should see something like this:

itemStackable[6685] = false; itemStackable[6687] = false;

There may be more of them. Simply change the item id and return it true.[/quote]
then what is the use of the ‘stackable’ DATA file?

IDs of items that can be stacked are stored there and they are loaded.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i Make items stackable!?

item.title: How can i Make items stackable!?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Try this:

Go into Item.java, and you should see something like this:

itemStackable[6685] = false; itemStackable[6687] = false;

There may be more of them. Simply change the item id and return it true.

Read full topic

item.title: How can i Make items stackable!?
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

I’m pretty sure theirs more then 1 way to do this.
But I’ll tell you client sided.
Get the int’s, then their is something that has stackable in them set to 0, change it to 1 or true or whatevery, and you can stack them.

Read full topic
